overview: Vancouver SEO / Web Designer / Photographer. I’m an experienced SEO | Web Designer who works in Wordpress and Magento. I have a diverse background with Web Design experience. I know how to use Social Media to boost your website profile and make your website “Share-able”. I’ve worked on corporate websites with both design and SEO projects. My specialty is blogging and setting up blogs. I have been blogging about Vancouver for 3 years.
